Uses of Class
org.eclipse.gef.requests.DirectEditRequest

  • Packages that use DirectEditRequest 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies
    This package contains EditPolicy implementations for many common editing Roles.
    org.eclipse.gef.tools
    This package provides several tool implementations.

    • Uses of DirectEditRequest in org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies

      Methods in org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies with parameters of type DirectEditRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void DirectEditPolicy.eraseDirectEditFeedback(DirectEditRequest request)
      If feedback is being shown, this method calls DirectEditPolicy.revertOldEditValue(DirectEditRequest).
      protected abstract Command DirectEditPolicy.getDirectEditCommand(DirectEditRequest request)
      Returns the Command to perform the direct edit.
      protected void DirectEditPolicy.revertOldEditValue(DirectEditRequest request)
      Helps erase feedback by reverting the original edit value.
      protected abstract void DirectEditPolicy.showCurrentEditValue(DirectEditRequest request)
      Override to show the current direct edit value in the host's Figure.
      protected void DirectEditPolicy.showDirectEditFeedback(DirectEditRequest request)
      Pushes the original edit value if necessary, and shows feedback.
      protected void DirectEditPolicy.storeOldEditValue(DirectEditRequest request)
      Called to remember the old value before direct edit feedback begins.

    • Uses of DirectEditRequest in org.eclipse.gef.tools

      Methods in org.eclipse.gef.tools that return DirectEditRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected DirectEditRequest DirectEditManager.createDirectEditRequest()
      Creates and returns the DirectEditRequest.
      protected DirectEditRequest DirectEditManager.getDirectEditRequest()
      Returns the direct edit request, creating it if needed.
